text: The Arrowhead Conference is a conference within the National Junior College Athletic Association located in region 4. The conference consists of six junior colleges located in northern Illinois. ==Members== Founding member institutions were Black Hawk College, Carl Sandburg College, Highland Community College (Illinois), Kishwaukee College and Sauk Valley Community College. In 1999 Illinois Valley Community College joined the conference. ==See also== *National Junior College Athletic Association ==References== Category:NJCAA conferences Category:College sports in Illinois
title: Arrowhead Conference
